title: Better Call Saul Season 6 Part 1 Review
description:
Go to http://meundies.com/kindafunny to get 15% off your first order.

Barrett, Roger, and Andy are joined once again by Jake Baldino to talk their thoughts on Better Call Saul Season 6 Part 1 on AMC.
